summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Campaigns module with real database integration. All backend APIs and frontend functionality working correctly with real data instead of mock data.
passed_tests: POST /api/v1/campaigns/{id}/start - start campaign and create recipients based on segment
GET /api/v1/campaigns/{id}/stats - return real recipient counts and statistics
POST /api/v1/campaigns/{id}/send-batch - send SMS to pending recipients
Campaign detail modal shows real stats (not mock data)
Recipients tab displays actual customer list from database
Send Messages tab has working Send Batch button
Campaign creation workflow with segment definition
Real-time stats updates after batch sending
Proper campaign status transitions (DRAFT -> RUNNING -> COMPLETED)
Campaign cards display real data and statistics
